description.p: Get the date and time value NrOfHours hours ahead of DateTime.

prototypes.prototype: AddHoursToDateTime as T (DateTime as T, NrOfHours as N)

description.p: The number of hours to add.
Returns the date and time value NrOfHours hours ahead of DateTime.

discussion.p: The AddHoursToDateTime function computes the date and time value NrOfHours hours ahead of DateTime.

example.caption: AddHoursToDateTime() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 Now() AS Now, AddHoursToDateTime(Now(), 6) AS Later FROM Orders =10/10/2019 12:45:57 00 pm|10/10/2019 06:45:57 00 pm
